title:
Forbidden paths and cycles in the undirected underlying graph of a
  2-quasi best match graph
abstract:
The undirected underlying graph of a 2-quasi best match graph (2-qBMG) is
proven not to contain any induced graph isomorphic to $P_6$ or $C_6$. This new
feature allows for the investigation of 2-BMGs further by exploiting the
numerous known results on $P_6$ and $C_6$ free graphs together with the
available polynomial algorithms developed for their studies. In this direction,
there are also some new contributions about dominating bicliques and certain
vertex decompositions of the undirected underlying graph of a 2-qBMG.
